entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is upset and anxious about something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who tries to calm Ron down and make decisions with Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who tries to calm Ron down and makes suggestions for what to do.

entities.name: norbert
entities.description: Norbert is a dragon that needs to be gotten rid of.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who has taken something from Ron and knows about the plan to get rid of Norbert.

entities.name: charlie
entities.description: Charlie is a person whose letter was in the book that Malfoy took.

relationships.description: Harry tries to calm Ron down.
Hermione tries to calm Ron down.
Malfoy has information about the plan to get rid of Norbert and knows that Ron is trying to hide it from him.
